member.name: T:TameMyCerts.REST.ActiveDirectory
member.summary: A class holding methods that help acquiring PKI related information from Active Directory.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.ActiveDirectory.GetEnrollmentServiceCollection(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a SearchResultCollection holding pKIEnrollmentService objects found in the directory.
member.param: Common name of a specific ca.

member.name: T:TameMyCerts.REST.CCertRequestExtensions
member.summary: A class that extends the functionality if ICertRequest for the needs of our API.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CCertRequestExtensions.RetrievePending(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a certificate from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CCertRequestExtensions.Submit(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Submits a certificate request to a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
The certificate request as BASE64 without headers.
An optional list of request attributes that shall be passed to the certificate authority.
Submission flags.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CCertRequestExtensions.GetCrlDpCollection(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves certificate revocation list distribution point information from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CCertRequestExtensions.GetAiaCollection(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves authority information access information from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CCertRequestExtensions.GetCaCertificate(CERTCLILib.CCertRequest,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a CA or CA exchange certificate from a certification authority.
member.param: The configuration string of the certification authority.
Returns the CA exchange certificate instead of the CA certificate.
Causes returned PKIX data to be encoded according to RFC 7468 instead of a plain BASE64 stream.

member.name: T:TameMyCerts.REST.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks
member.summary: A class that helps identifying the type of the certificate request and harmonizing it for further processing.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.VerifyCertificateRequest(System.String,System.Int32,System.String@)
member.summary: Verifies if the certificate request can be parsed as defined by the requestType.
member.param: The certificate request in BASE64 format, with or without headers.
The request type specifies how the certificate request is to be interpreted.
Harmonized certificate request, returned as BASE64 without header, regardless of the given input.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.REST.CertificateRequestIntegrityChecks.DetectRequestType(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Identifies the type of the given certificate request.
member.param: The input certificate request as BASE64 encoded DER.
The output certificate request as BASE64 encoded DER.
member.returns: The request type to be used with ICertRequest::Submit.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_CA_DENIED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You do not have permission to request certificates from {0}..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_INVALID_CSR
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to parse the given certificate request..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_INVALID_REQUEST
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The submitted request is malformed and cannot be processed..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_CA
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certification authority {0} was not found..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_PARAMETER
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The {0} parameter is missing or invalid..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_MISSING_TEMPLATE
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The certificate template {0} was not found..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_SUBMISSION_FAILED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unable to connect to certification authority because {0}..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.DESC_TEMPLATED_DENIED
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You do not have permission to enroll for {0}..

member.name: P:TameMyCerts.REST.LocalizedStrings.UNKNOWN
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to unknown.

.{64}

member.name: T:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType
member.summary: Key Usage types according to RFC 5280.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.digitalSignature
member.summary: The digitalSignature bit is asserted when the subject public key is used for verifying digital signatures, other than signatures on certificates , such as those used in an entity authentication service, a data origin authentication service, and/or an integrity service.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.nonRepudiation
member.summary: The nonRepudiation bit is asserted when the subject public key is used to verify digital signatures, other than signatures on certificates , used to provide a non-repudiation service that protects against the signing entity falsely denying some action. In the case of later conflict, a reliable third party may determine the authenticity of the signed data.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.keyEncipherment
member.summary: The keyEncipherment bit is asserted when the subject public key is used for enciphering private or secret keys, i.e., for key transport. For example, this bit shall be set when an RSA public key is to be used for encrypting a symmetric content-decryption key or an asymmetric private key.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.dataEncipherment
member.summary: The dataEncipherment bit is asserted when the subject public key is used for directly enciphering raw user data without the use of an intermediate symmetric cipher.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.keyAgreement
member.summary: The keyAgreement bit is asserted when the subject public key is used for key agreement. For example, when a Diffie-Hellman key is to be used for key management, then this bit is set.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.keyCertSign
member.summary: The keyCertSign bit is asserted when the subject public key is used for verifying signatures on public key certificates.

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.cRLSign
member.summary: The cRLSign bit is asserted when the subject public key is used for verifying signatures on certificate revocation lists (e.g., CRLs, delta CRLs, or ARLs).

member.name: F:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.KeyUsageType.encipherOnly
member.summary: The meaning of the encipherOnly bit is undefined in the absence of the keyAgreement bit. When the encipherOnly bit is asserted and the keyAgreement bit is also set, the subject public key may be used only for enciphering data while performing key agreement.

member.name: M:TameMyCerts.NetCore.Common.Models.KeyUsage.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Builds a KeyUsage out of the given integer value.
member.param: The value to build the object from.
